features.featureTitle: Update the selected Mission Section mascot element (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[2]/img[1]) so it uses the user-uploaded photo instead of the current generated mascot image.
